parentDataList.nodeContext: status == Status.BUFFER_UNDERFLOW || handshakeStatus != HandshakeStatus.NEED_TASK && (consumed == 0 && produced == 0 || (length == 0 && handshakeStatus == HandshakeStatus.NOT_HANDSHAKING))

currentLineData.nodeContext: status == Status.BUFFER_UNDERFLOW || handshakeStatus != HandshakeStatus.NEED_TASK && (consumed == 0 && produced == 0 || (length == 0 && handshakeStatus == HandshakeStatus.NOT_HANDSHAKING))
